It is an advanced course for those who want to learn how to make marketing decisions with "face-based" approach. Having statistical knowledge in advance (or having taken statistics) is strongly recommended. 
老師人很好、教學認真，雖然偏重但是是很紮實的一門好課！

The lecture is very rich in context.
I learned a lot in this class, especially in SPSS.
SPSS is very useful and I am glad that I can apply it when analyzing data now.
By the way, Professor is very cute !
認真學會學到很多東西，但要有心理準備這是堂硬課

The project design is not good that the burden of researching works all rest on Taiwanese students.
Also, too much things are covered, which is hard to absorb them all.
There can be either doing project OR having exams but not both.
老師很認真 看得出來在教學上下了很大的功夫 也能實際找到企業進行合作
朴星俊教授非常非常用心，是一個充滿有教學熱忱而且有料的老師，上課內容豐富紮實，但內容有點硬，可能是老師太厲害了qq，整體來說是一個必推的好課！！！
擋修統計，不然會聽得很辛苦

I really learned a lot from this class! Finally know how statistics can be used in real life, gain insights from data analysis and solve managerial problems.
Thank you so much Professor Park! You always give us great advice whenever needed
